Text: The name of the author is Harshbarger (the filename is correct). Here on TPB, torrent descriptions can only be edited by begging twice on the forum, once to delete the description and once to remove the hash (torrent's DNA) from the index. What takes less than a minute on other sites takes days here. [sigh]

Any way thanks for such great torrents!
